welcomePublic: Welcome to Deniz Family Household tasks!
li1: This website is for Deniz family to manage their household tasks.
li2: So that everyone at home has their responsibilities to do and it will be managed via this app
li3: Parents would assign a task to individual child and each child will be able to see her own tasks and mark as completed.
li4: Also each member can create a task for themselves.
li5: Only parents and admin are authorized to delete a task, create a task for any users, access all tasks, and create a user.
li6: Contact your manager, Elif, regarding password and membership procedures.
title: Title
